title: Instant Pot Chicken Shawarma

main: 4 lbs boneless, skinless chicken thighs (cut into strips with fat trimmed)
cooking_fats: ½ cup extra virgin olive oil
liquid: ½ cup garlic broth (or chicken broth)

steps: Add butter and olive oil to Instant Pot. Use Sauté mode on High setting.
Once hot, add onion and garlic. Cook 3-5 minutes until softened.
Add chicken thighs and all spices. Stir thoroughly to coat.
Pour in garlic/chicken broth and deglaze pot bottom.
Pressure cook on High for 7 minutes with quick release.
Assemble wraps with warmed pita, hummus, chicken mixture, vegetables, and tzatziki.
Drizzle with spiced cooking oil before serving.
